choose.when: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT REF_BNO, COUNT(*) FROM RECOMMEND R JOIN BOARD B ON(B.BOARD_NO = R.REF_BNO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY R.REF_BNO HAVING COUNT(*) > 1)
choose.otherwise:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
AND BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
AND JOB_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
AND LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
AND BOARD_WRITER = #{currentWriterNo}

choose.when: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, COUNT, CATEGORY_NAME, USER_ID AS BOARD_WRITER, COUNT(*) AS RECOMMEND_COUNT FROM (SELECT * FROM RECOMMEND R JOIN BOARD B ON(R.REF_BNO = B.BOARD_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO) JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY BC ON(B.CATEGORY_CODE = BC.CATEGORY_CODE) WHERE B.STATUS='Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) GROUP BY BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, COUNT, CATEGORY_NAME, USER_ID HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
choose.otherwise:
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, COUNT, CATEGORY_NAME, USER_ID AS BOARD_WRITER, COUNT(REF_BNO) AS RECOMMEND_COUNT FROM (SELECT * FROM RECOMMEND R RIGHT JOIN BOARD B ON(R.REF_BNO = B.BOARD_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO) JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY BC ON(B.CATEGORY_CODE = BC.CATEGORY_CODE) WHERE B.STATUS='Y'
AND M.USER_ID = #{currentWriter}
)
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
AND BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
AND JOB_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
AND LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
GROUP BY BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, COUNT, CATEGORY_NAME, USER_ID ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, COUNT, CATEGORY_CODE, CATEGORY_NAME, USER_ID AS BOARD_WRITER FROM BOARD B JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO) WHERE B.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY(REPLY_NO, REF_BNO, REPLY_WRITER, REPLY_CONTENT) VALUES(SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL, #{refBno}, #{replyWriter}, #{replyContent})
